thread.title: Elena Mazzoleni
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Elena Mazzoleni

author: Elena Mazzoleni
title: Elena Mazzoleni
text: I found the Website so interesting and helpful. It helped me to understand finally so many aspects of the Solar system that really matters for the everyday buyer: from understanding if the investment was 'economically' logic for me to getting to know options and their pro/versus.... Suggesting important questions to ask and helping to make sense of the answers I was getting. Overall a very good help!
